body:
## Release Notes

- Support `_e` suffix for internal cmp enums. @iphydf (#260)
- Add release-drafter github action. @iphydf (#259)
- Adapt to prettyprinter changes in cimple. @iphydf (#258)
- Migrate from ansi-wl-pprint to prettyprinter. @iphydf (#257)
- add libsodium's unsigned 32bit random function @Green-Sky (#255)
- Add OPUS_SET_VBR, so we can disable it @Green-Sky (#254)
- Add preliminary support for `owner` pointer qualifier. @iphydf (#253)
- Add crypto_sign_SEEDBYTES which we now use in toxcore. @iphydf (#251)
- Add missing `crypto_box_MACBYTES`. @iphydf (#250)
- Add support for bitwise/force types in typecheck. @iphydf (#249)
- Unify struct and name into struct. @iphydf (#248)
- Support delayed type definition for function defns. @iphydf (#247)
- Ignore malloc cast checks in alloc functions. @iphydf (#246)
- Remove exemptions for cmp symbols. @iphydf (#245)
- Adapt to nullptr now being a constant expression. @iphydf (#244)
- Exempt cmp.c from conversion checking. @iphydf (#243)
- Add `-Wcallback-params` and `-Wstruct-pack`. @iphydf (#242)
- Add a test for typedef array parameter size check. @iphydf (#239)
- Add `-Wsize-arg` to check array size arguments. @iphydf (#238)
- Add `-Wmalloc-call`. @iphydf (#237)
- Relax int conversions further. @iphydf (#235)
- Allow non-const array to be assigned to const array. @iphydf (#234)
- Remove settings.yml in favour of hs-github-tools. @iphydf (#233)
- Use GPL license with https. @iphydf (#232)
- `-Wvoid-call` to validate the format of callback handlers. @iphydf (#231)
- Update `-Wcallgraph` to support symbols from the system PR. @iphydf (#227)
- Add doc generator to no-cross. @iphydf (#230)
- Also add QueryPerformanceFrequency. @iphydf (#229)
- Add support for QueryPerformanceCounter from winapi. @iphydf (#228)
- add UINT64_C to stdint.h @Green-Sky (#225)
- Add documentation for all cimple linters. @iphydf (#226)
- Add `-Wnesting` to limit nesting depth in functions. @iphydf (#224)
- Disable targets for cross-compilation. @iphydf (#223)
- Refine imports to avoid the meta-module. @iphydf (#222)
- Add linter to detect sequences of `#defines` that should be enums. @iphydf (#221)
- Add libev symbols to list of known symbols. @iphydf (#220)
- Add some temporary hacks for ordered-events PR. @iphydf (#219)
- Add linter to check for memset writing to pointers. @iphydf (#218)
- Add unit tests for C linters. @iphydf (#217)
- Add enum unpack function generator (linter). @iphydf (#216)
- Change enum `from_int` functions to use out parameters. @iphydf (#215)
- Rewrite check-c with a TraverseAst pattern. @iphydf (#213)
- Check that enum `from_int` functions are correct. @iphydf (#212)
- Add support for passing the path to a C compiler to check-c. @iphydf (#211)
- Add new libsodium functions used by the noise implementation. @iphydf (#210)
- Allow member access in `assert()`. @iphydf (#209)
- Allow `a?b:c` in assert. @iphydf (#208)
- Use `parseProgram` instead of `parseFiles`. @iphydf (#207)
- Update to new third_party method for haskell deps. @iphydf (#206)
- Add `randombytes` to exemptions list for charptr cast. @iphydf (#205)
- Upgrade stack LTS snapshot to 21.9 (GHC 9.4.6). @iphydf (#204)
- Allow implicit conversions to `const void *`. @iphydf (#203)
- Fix ansi-wl-pprint dependency at 0.6.9. @iphydf (#202)
- Increase cimple version dependency to 0.0.17. @iphydf (#201)
- Update dockerfile documentation to ubuntu 22.04. @iphydf (#200)
- Add exemptions for `-Wcallgraph` so we can reenable it. @iphydf (#198)
- Get tokstyle ready for `mem` module changes. @iphydf (#197)

## Features

- add a check-c run option for a custom include path @JFreegman (#240)
- Require that `*_free` and `kill_*` functions are nullable. @iphydf (#190)
- Add linter to detect `if`s that should be `switch`es. @iphydf (#188)
- Output timing details for check-cimple. @iphydf (#174)
- Prevent non-pure function calls in `assert()`. @iphydf (#163)
- Check for unused symbols. @iphydf (#160)
- Add cycle detection code and exemptions. @iphydf (#157)
- Add check that all symbols used are defined. @iphydf (#156)
- More improvements and simplifications to type check. @iphydf (#155)
- Add check for functions that could return `bool`. @iphydf (#153)
- Check for `x == true` and `x == false`. @iphydf (#152)
- Improved type checking some more. @iphydf (#151)
- Disallow parens in assignment expressions. @iphydf (#150)
- Check for comparisons of bool and non-bool. @iphydf (#149)
- Add check that we don't use `sizeof(ptr)`. @iphydf (#146)
- Improved type checking. @iphydf (#144)
- Check for returning 1/0 in bool functions. @iphydf (#142)
- Add stronger checks on casts. @iphydf (#140)
- Add `select()` to the libc headers. @iphydf (#137)
- Check boolean conversions inside logical operators. @iphydf (#135)
- Implement stronger type checking in assignments. @iphydf (#131)
- Add support for everything needed by toxav. @iphydf (#130)
- Add type checking tool using language-c. @iphydf (#127)
- Check that all pointer arguments have nullability annotations. @iphydf (#122)
- Add check to make sure we don't pass large structs by value. @iphydf (#117)
- Add enum-names check. @iphydf (#113)
- Stricter checks on malloc size argument. @iphydf (#111)
- Add more functions to the unsafe list with explanations. @iphydf (#110)
- Add "unsafe function" checker. @iphydf (#109)
- Check that memcpy is not used where assignment could be used. @iphydf (#104)
- Check that function arguments don't have `()` around them. @iphydf (#105)
- Check that `malloc` is only used for builtin types. @iphydf (#103)
- Check calloc argument order and cast type. @iphydf (#102)
- Add check that Logger is always passed as ptr-to-const. @iphydf (#101)
- Add check for useless parentheses. @iphydf (#100)
- Show suggestions for misspelled defns. @iphydf (#97)
- Check that typedef structs share the name with the struct. @iphydf (#96)
- Add check for variables that can be reduced in scope. @iphydf (#95)

## Performance improvements

- Use non-copying TraverseAst. @iphydf (#119)
- Run tokstyle checkers in parallel. @iphydf (#106)

## Bug Fixes

- Add missing well-known constant we now use in toxcore. @iphydf (#263)
- add back a leading slash removed by accident @JFreegman (#241)
- add shared_key_is_empty(...) to pure functions @sudden6 (#196)
- Add Net_Packet_Type to exemptions for -Wlarge-struct-params. @iphydf (#193)
- Add exemption for in `-Wparens` for `if ((x))`. @iphydf (#191)
- Allow up to 2 if-branches to not be a switch. @iphydf (#192)
- Slightly better support again for pointer arithmetic. @iphydf (#187)
- Disable VLA support to catch more errors. @iphydf (#186)
- Disallow `sizeof(MyStruct*)` with 1 exemption. @iphydf (#185)
- Slight improvement of pointer subtraction type check. @iphydf (#180)
- Fix `-Wvar-unused-in-scope` for `if` inside `for`. @iphydf (#172)
- Fix `-Wdoc-comments` on functions with `non_null`. @iphydf (#170)
- Consider symbols used in struct definitions as "used". @iphydf (#167)
- Consider types with the same name to be the same type. @iphydf (#165)
- Add `struct` to the list of types that aren't pointers. @iphydf (#147)
- Remove exemption for binary expressions in if stmts. @iphydf (#139)
- Allow int-to-enum conversion. @iphydf (#136)

## Documentation

- Add some documentation to `SwitchIf.shouldDiagnose`. @iphydf (#189)
- Add a tutorial for writing linters. @iphydf (#168)

## Maintenance (Grunt tasks)

- Add tox_options.h to the public API. @iphydf (#265)
- Add more descriptive/precise tags to bazel build rules. @iphydf (#264)
- Add `SO_EXCLUSIVEADDRUSE` to known external constants. @iphydf (#261)
- Add tox_private.h to the exemptions list for -Wdecls-have-defns. @iphydf (#184)
- Add some more tox_options functions to the exemptions. @iphydf (#182)
- Add missing cmp function. @iphydf (#179)
- Exempt bin_pack/unpack functions from `-Wcallgraph`. @iphydf (#178)
- Add cmp functions to callgraph exemptions list. @iphydf (#176)
- Add more sodium functions to the list of builtins. @iphydf (#166)
- Add SELF_UDP_STATUS_LAN to callgraph exemption list @JFreegman (#162)
- Add a new enum to the exemptions list. @iphydf (#134)
- Add check-c to the cabal file. @iphydf (#129)
- Add common CI workflow, currently includes buildifier. @iphydf (#126)
- Add Packet_Direction enum to exemption list @JFreegman (#123)
- Use toktok-stack image for haskell stack builds. @iphydf (#125)
- Use the docker image for CI builds. @iphydf (#124)
- Use latest instead of versioned toktok-stack image. @iphydf (#115)
- Upgrade to latest toktok-stack @iphydf (#114)
- Link check-cimple with `-rtsopts` to allow more parallelism. @iphydf (#108)
- Fix buildifier warning. @iphydf (#107)
- Use standard CI workflow now that it's downgraded. @iphydf (#94)
- Add bazel file for the web app. @iphydf (#93)
- Rename Cimple.Analysis to Linter. @iphydf (#91)
- Add newline to the `/source` endpoint in the web app. @iphydf (#90)
- Use check_release without the path argument. @iphydf (#89)
- Checkout current repo before ci-tools. @iphydf (#88)
- Fix ci-tools checkout. @iphydf (#87)
- Use the hackage_upload script from ci-tools. @iphydf (#86)
- Use ci-tools for check_release. @iphydf (#85)
- Fix path to check_release. @iphydf (#84)
- Check that GitHub release name matches the one in BUILD.bazel. @iphydf (#82)
- Use the same cache key in publish and ci workflows. @iphydf (#81)

## Maintenance (Code cleanup)

- Use `tools` instead of `exec_tools`. @iphydf (#262)
- Slightly tighten allowed implicit int conversions. @iphydf (#183)
- Reuse `mustParse` in other tests. @iphydf (#171)
- Use type intersection instead of union for `?:`. @iphydf (#161)
- Reject paren-expr in `return`. @iphydf (#159)
- Slight code improvements. @iphydf (#148)
- Slight improvement of this ugly code. @iphydf (#133)
- Remove obsolete checker. @iphydf (#121)
- Remove Node_format from exemptions list for memcpy. @iphydf (#116)
- Remove `Cmp_data` exemptions. @iphydf (#112)

## Maintenance (Refactoring)

- Update to changed AST representation in cimple. @iphydf (#99)
- Use new y-combinator based AST from Cimple. @iphydf (#92)

## Maintenance (Tests)

- Add a test to make sure arrays are treated as expected. @iphydf (#175)
name: v0.0.9
